html:
A cute, yellow ball
Just rolled in
I have poems for it
It has nothing for me
But it’s always good
To have a cute, yellow ball
It’s nice when they’re near
It’s nice when they roll
And despite the fact
We’re far away
It’s good we can hear
Eachother, hey!
I’ll finish it with
Just simple few words
The world is much better
With cute, yellow balls
title: A cute, yellow ball
